category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EPM_enable_apply_template_changes
preference.preference_description: Enables template changes to all active workflow processes in the client. Valid Values: NONE: template changes will not be applied to active workflow processes and no option will be presented in the client. This is the default value. OPTIONAL: a) in Workflow Designer when the template stage is being changed to Available, a follow-up dialog will be displayed prompting the user if the template changes should be applied to all active workflow processes. b) an additional checkbox will be displayed in the "Workflow Template Import" dialog to determine if the template changes should be applied to all active workflow processes. AUTOMATIC: template changes will be automatically applied to all active workflow processes. The user will not be prompted to specify if the template changes should be applied.
